references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: D. A. Klarner, Sequences of k-th powers with k-th power partial sums, Math. Mag., 37 (1964), 165-167.
D. A. Klarner, Sequences of k-th powers with k-th power partial sums, Math. Mag., 37 (1964), 165-167. Annotated scanned copy.
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[2] = 6; a[3] = 8; a[n_] := a[n] = If[EvenQ[n], 3*a[n-1]^2 + 8*a[n-1] + 6, 3*a[n-2]^3 + 12*a[n-2]^2 + 17*a[n-2] + 8]; Array[a, 10] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 15 2016, after _Sean A. Irvine_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: One more term from _Sean A. Irvine_, Sep 15 2011
